title: Anime Royale Tier List
description: Comprehensive guide ranking Anime Royale units from S Tier to C Tier, providing detailed insights into each unit's performance and utility.
heading: Anime Royale Tier List
introText: Comprehensive guide ranking Anime Royale units from S Tier to C Tier, providing detailed insights into each unit's performance and utility.

data.itemDescription: A secret unit with exceptional DPS, full AoE attacks, hybrid capabilities, and impressive range, making her one of the strongest units in the game
A hybrid unit with high DPS, good attack speed, large AoE, and one of the highest ranges, making him a top-tier choice
A hill unit renowned for multi-hit attacks, extensive range, and significant damage, excelling at breaking enemy shields
Offers excellent range, DPS, and a potent damage-over-time effect, with a cone AoE attack that can hit flying enemies when fully upgraded
A legendary hill unit that inflicts burn damage, capable of shredding enemy shields and dealing respectable damage
A full AoE mythic unit capable of targeting flying enemies, with multi-hit attacks that briefly stun enemies, providing both damage and utility
Excels at dealing with shields in early stages; when fully upgraded, becomes a top-tier DPS unit with high damage and low attack speed
A solid hill unit suitable until stronger units are obtained; lacks multi-hit or burn effects when fully upgraded, limiting effectiveness against shielded flying enemies
Considered one of the weaker legendary units; limited placements, lack of hybrid capability, and subpar range diminish effectiveness
Applies burn damage with multiple ticks but lacks overall utility and effectiveness
Known for high raw DPS among legendary units, with good range and AoE, able to target flying enemies; however, placement and upgrades are costly
An epic hill unit with multi-hit attacks and good DPS; overshadowed by higher-tier units due to limited placements
An epic hill unit with multi-hit attacks and decent DPS; limited placements reduce overall utility
Notable range for a rare unit with multi-hit attacks, serving as a competent shield-breaker
